modals.recoveryphrase.backupyourwallet.c: 1. Write down the 12 word phrase on the next screen in the exact order it appears.
In crypto, when you hold the private keys, you're in control of the funds in your Private Key Wallet. The downside is that WHOEVER holds your private keys can control your Private Key Wallet.
3. NEVER share your Secret Private Key Recovery Phrase with anyone.
2. Keep it safe, ideally on a securely stored piece of paper (in other words, not a digital copy).
Warning: If someone has your Secret Private Key Recovery Phrase they will have access to your Private Key Wallet and can withdraw funds.
Blockchain.com will never ask to view or receive your Secret Private Key Recovery Phrase.
